channel.title: MezzyScape 459 - Bring it Back
channel.description:
[img]http://img545.imageshack.us/img545/6297/4f5f9a4d9d29c91fa300001.png[/img] [size=14pt][b]Don't Flame[/b][/size]
Development Group~ 1.Mezzyscape562 - Head Devloper 2.XenoForce - Develop/Graphic Designer
[Color=green]Finished![/color] Working on Not started
[ul][*]Stable Hyperion base, with all features coded well thus giving you a great seamless playing experience [*]All skills completed to a high standard, with detail in mind and perfection as the outcome [*]Shops all over the Runescape map. [*]Skillcape shop only gives capes which you have earned. Earning more than 2 99 skills gives you a selection of trimmed capes. [*]Experience rate has been perfected, therefore engaging you in the game and giving you a sense of accomplishment [*]Perfect weight system, affects running time just like Runescape [*]Imps spawn all over the map giving a great Hunting experience [*]PERFECT Combat [*]Clipped Walking [*]Clipped Following [*]All doors and gates on the map work [*]Perfect combat [*]Great community [*]Loads of bosses added, KBD, Chaos Elemental, Green Dragon, Barrelchest [*]Perfect warriors guild [*]All new maps added [*]Cyclops to obtain defenders in warriors guild [*]Fully working duel arena with NO dupes [*]Trading DUPE proof [*]Fully functional fight caves, all 63 waves included [*]Pest control is the best on any server, this means that EVERYTHING works on it. Portals, Spinners, Brawlers, Shifters, Ravagers, NPC vs NPC, Barricades and doors destroying, Points exchange [*]Tonnes of ladders and stairs documented [*]100% Perfect NPC Spawns [/ul]
Features Of Mezzyscape Combat [ul][*]Npc Combat [*] Following [*] Facing [*] Clipping [*] This monster is already in combat [/ul]
Player Combat [ul][*] Clipped Following [*] Facing [*] 1v1 [*] Multi [*] Skulling System [/ul]
Banking [ul] [*] Item saving [*] Noting support [*] Storing & withdrawing (1,5,10,X,All) [*] Re Arranging with saving positions [*] Deposit Boxes [/ul]
Trading [ul][*] Anti-Dupe System [*] Confirm screen [*] Offering & Removing (1,5,10,X,All) [*] Other players available inventory slots [/ul]
Quests [ul] [*] Lost City [*] Between a rock [*] Black knights fortress [*] Desert treasure [*] Legends quest [*] Lunar diplomacy [*] Monkey madness [*] Tutorial island [/ul]
Mini-Games [ul][*] Fight Caves [*] Duel Arena [*] Perfect Pest Control [*] Warrior's Guild [*] Barrows [/ul]
Skills [ul] [*] Agility [list] [*]Influence how long you'll be able to Run. [*] Failing Obstacles [*] Restoring Your Energy [*] Gnome Agility Course [/list] [*] Construction [list] [*] Gardens [*] Parlours [*] Kitchens [*] Dining Rooms [*] Workshops [*] Bedrooms [*] Skill Halls [/list] [*] Cooking [list] [*]Helpful Drinks [*] Cooking Gauntlets [*] All Fish [*] All Foods [/list] [*] Crafting [list] [*]Pottery [*] Leather [*] Dragonhide Leather [*] Jewelry [*] Glass Making [*] Spinning [/list] [*] Firemaking [list] [*] All Logs [*] Lanterns [*] Firelighters [*] Clipped Autowalk [/list] [*] Fishing [list] [*] Fishing Gear [*] Catching Fish [/list] [*] Fletching [list] [*] Fletching Arrows [*] Fletching Bows [*] Fletching Crossbows [*] Darts [/list] [*] Herblore [list] [*] Obtaining Herbs [*] Obtaining Vials [*] Creating Potions [*] Combining & Emptying Potions [*] Cleaning Herbs [*] All Ingredients [*] All Potions [/list] [*] Hunter [list] [*] Imps [/list] [*] Mining [list] [*] Mining All Ores [*] Pickaxe Requirements [*] Limestone [*] Rune Essence [*] Blurite [/list] [*] Prayer [list] [*] Stat-Boosting Altars [*] Bone burying [*] Protect Prayers [*] Amulets & Symbols [*] Prayers [*] Clothing [*] Maces & Other Weapons [/list] [*] Runecrafting [list] [*] Runecrafting Pouches [*] Rune Essence [*] Pure Rune Essence [*] Talismans [*] Tiaras [*] Runecrafting Altars [*] Abyss [*] Crafting Runes [/list] [*] Slayer [list] [*] Slayer Masters [*] Low level Tasks [*] Medium level Tasks [*] High level Tasks [*] The Enchanted Gem [*] Equipment [*] Slayer Dungeons [/list] [*] Smithing [list] [*] Smelting Ores [*] Smithing Bronze [*] Smithing Blurite [*] Smithing Iron [*] Smithing Elemental [*] Smithing Steel [*] Smithing Mithril [*] Smithing Adamant [*] Smithing Rune [/list] [*] Thieving [list] [*] Picking Pockets (All npcs & Correct Items) [*] Looting Market Stalls [*] Chest Looting
[/list] [*] Woodcutting [list] [*] All Trees [*] All Axes [*] Bird Nests [/list] Pictures [img]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/2161/bb329fc95e8e41e39b44f9d.png[/img] [img]http://img267.imageshack.us/img267/9492/e5fc3656400e41098838d3a.png[/img] [img]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/2581/a3f2ac4d527745cc883852a.png[/img] [img]http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/9002/993b4a6892254001b47ce72.png[/img] [img]http://img714.imageshack.us/img714/8229/05a0fc8dc909484595cb60a.png[/img] [img]http://img841.imageshack.us/img841/204/d7be5b1b31a14bdfb89b036.png[/img] [img]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/7189/0d1f1502246a4e32a90c055.png[/img] More Coming Soon...[/ul]

item.title: MezzyScape 459 - Bring it Back
item.dc:creator: @seekereb seekereb
item.description:
@seekereb wrote:

I’ve been looking for a private server with an actual construction skill for over five years now. I’ve only come across a couple, none of which were decent. :\

If you do this, I’ll love you forever.

Read full topic

item.title: MezzyScape 459 - Bring it Back
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

This is Project Annihilation Source. but, i can see you added “just a little” new things.

Read full topic

item.title: MezzyScape 459 - Bring it Back
item.dc:creator: @Mezzyscape562 Mezzyscape562
item.description:
@Mezzyscape562 wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:82, topic:436237”][quote author=Mezzyscape562 link=topic=538959.msg4006120#msg4006120 date=1338657777]

Fixed Mapdata!.. Without it Construction wouldn’t work because jinrake’s client was Fucked up…
I removed that Crappy Mysql.
Added Highscores (Easy)
Fixed Up Some Bugs
Removed the Pking points
Fixed Tutorial island Because the gate part was fucked up… Currently Fixing up the wardrobe Part.
So yeaa… Thats pretty much everything i remmember…
EDIT: O yeah Also Fixed up the Quest tab so all of them Show up…
Then Comes the Website part… Which I have to Re-Do it Again

  1. Fair enough, I didn’t even know it was bugged
  2. Sigh MySQL is NOT crappy, it is one of the most useful database tools out there
  3. That involves MySQL heh.
  4. Yeah, Jinsanity & PJA both had lots of bugs
  5. Meh, don’t know if that counts as “progress” but okay
  6. I don’t know what gate part you’re talking about
  7. Quest tab is easy
  8. I don’t know what’s wrong with the website o.o

Quest tab was easy…
Website is Confusing…
uHHH I hated the Mysql ;/
[/quote]
MySQL is a very useful tool. If you ever want help with it, feel free to ask me[/quote]
Ik how to use it i just dont have the .sql files

Read full topic

Added Highscores (Easy)
Fixed Up Some Bugs
Removed the Pking points
Fixed Tutorial island Because the gate part was fucked up… Currently Fixing up the wardrobe Part.
So yeaa… Thats pretty much everything i remmember…

Then Comes the Website part… Which I have to Re-Do it Again
